Reviews.Title: great buy for the money
Reviews.Author: a reader
Reviews.Content: Ive had it 2 months.  Play it all the time, cable & Netflix.  No glare from floor lamps on the screen.  Had to get a better router though (not the tv's fault).  Great picture - enough adjustments unless you're a total videophile twiddler. Certainly looked better than the others in the store that day.  Nice and bright, only cost me $899 - what's not to like?

Reviews.Title: Great Item!!
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: I recently got this TV through amazon and absolutely love it!! It has a great clear picture, and it's functions are amazing. I have only 2 complaints. The TV only does Media Direct to PC computers, and I own a Mac. Also the product was shipped through Home Direct, whom I do not really care for. But half way through shipping I had it changed to FedEx and had a great experience. The TV is fabulous!!

Reviews.Title: good as advertised Philips bought on Amazon
Reviews.Author: barkat
Reviews.Content: Had little trouble hooking up the laptop computer to the TV with and HDMI cable, and then configuring it...worked on the first try.  This TV has a very good picture and color, and is a great compliment to my living room.

Reviews.Title: Really Good TV
Reviews.Author: HT
Reviews.Content: Picture is very good, wireless internet and net tv are very good also. Can use as a computer monitor wirelessly also which is AMAZING! It would be GREAT if Apps could be added like Skype, or ebay, etc etc. Love Youtube  and Pandora  , Netflix is ok, would be better if they had an easier search method. Remote control would be better if I could program it to work the entire tv rather than having to use the old one for changing channels and this one for sound.Perhaps I should mention what for me is the most important and also the best feature of this TV, Phillips has the best support team I have ever experienced. They answer the phone and guide me through setup and any issues I had were immediately resolved! I give them a 10 .

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: deb
Reviews.Content: Product delivered on time and was in great condition.  Initially had problems getting enough bars for the internet.  Contacted Phillips support and received excellent service.  They advised on the maximum range the TV had to be from the router, since mine was futher than recommended, they suggested I purchase a wi-fi extender.  Did so and have excellent service.  Love the built in apps and sleek look of the units.  Great Buy

Reviews.Title: Decent Picture, TERRIBLE user interface, and inflated feature set...
Reviews.Author: P. Lyons "p"
Reviews.Content: Ok I'll make this short and simple.The TV has a decent picture, it's 55 inches and has pretty uniform picture with respect to brightness and contrast.Once you've managed to get what you want to watch on the screen, it's a great TV.But the user interface of this thing is utterly terrible.  It require patience to do the simplest of things.The biggest peeve Ive discovered with it is that the DLNA feature printed on the box is a bunch of {words that amazon would have probably censored out).  You have to download this exe written by a company other than philips onto a PC on your network to broadcast to the tv-  oh, and it doesnt even work for me, so who knows if it will work for you.Everytime I have to use the UI on this TV I regret buying it, but if you just want a simple 55" TV it's great.If you buy this TV, buy it with a Logitech revue or something so you never have to use the UI.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Fletch
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for 528.00 at Target and while the picture is not as clear, bright and sharp as my other sets, it is a good picture. My only complaint is the remote is weak. Using another remote solved that issue.  The wireless media connect is fussy about the PC connectivity, but I have had no issues with the built in Netflix,  Pandora or other services.  If you can pick one up for $528, you'll get a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Bought from Costco in March 2012
Reviews.Author: M.M
Reviews.Content: Bought it from Costco in March of 2012. Not even a year later it won't turn on-- it just keeps restarting itself over and over. The splash screen comes up and as soon as that would normally go away, it turns off then back on, and repeats. I've left it running for hours and it keeps doing this cycle.I contacted Costco and we did some basic troubleshooting. I also did some on my own (checked A/C voltage, etc). Costco contacted the manufacturer and I was told I'd be given a call back from a local repair company that will come and check it out... but that was a week ago. I imagine when I actually DO get the call, it will be another week or two from there. Then if they can't repair it, another week or two before I'd get a replacement.When this TV works it looks pretty good. But now I'm worried this piece of crap is going to just be going out every year until the warranties are out. This seems to be a recurring problem for this model.Avoid buying this unless you want an unserviceable brick in a couple years. I had a feeling I should have gone with Samsung or Toshiba. Anyone else bothered that Philips also makes medical equipment?Update on Feb 9th, 2013: Still no contact from Philips or Costco, or any repair companies about having it repaired or replaced under warranty. I was given an issue number on it more than a month ago when I contacted them. No one is able to provide additional information at this time. This TV is garbage, and Philips is clearly not standing behind their manufacturer warranty.

Reviews.Title: Bad television
Reviews.Author: Holly
Reviews.Content: Bought this television in the middle of November 2012, on January 13th the television would not turn on.I took it back to SAM's with the receipt. They told me I needed the original paperwork and the receipt or they couldn't take it back. I asked to speak to a manager and he happily let me exchange the television.

Reviews.Title: Unreliable TV and very poor Warranty Service
Reviews.Author: Normal Joe
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV in February of 2012. It has twice failed with a power suppply issue. The first time (May 2012) it kept power cycling, i.e. on then off then on then off. Under warantee it took four weeks to get it fixed. It has just died again, July 2012, won't power on again. It has been eleven days and Philips just assigned a service provider to even come look at it. The service provider they contract with says they can't come to my house for another nine days. And, this doesn't mean they'll bring or have the right parts on hand. The bottom line is that in five and a half months, the TV has worked for three and a half. Do yourself a favor and don't buy any expensive TV from Philips that you want to work or get serviced when it breaks.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Price
Reviews.Author: ajapierce
Reviews.Content: Great TV, no problems with the setup.But like any big TV, APC Battery backup power strip to protect your investment

Reviews.Title: Tv is crap!
Reviews.Author: Henry Kim "Xsnirvana"
Reviews.Content: 4 months after I bought it, upgraded the firmware, it now shuts down and keeps restarting on its own! What a disappointment. Picture is so so. Ok when bright daylight scenes, contrast is piss poor and images are extremely grainy when scenes are in dark interiors or at night. You can definitely find something better for your basement.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy
Reviews.Author: Fgallegos
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv a week ago.  It has failed.  I was told the front panel needed to be replaced and that is no longer available.  I get no picture but I get sound.  This happens intermittently.

Reviews.Title: Not Bad
Reviews.Author: Big Papa Craig
Reviews.Content: I like this purchase. Good buy for the money. Quality of the picture is great, wireless connectivity a huge plus, it make streaming video convenient. There will be plenty movie nights in our house, you can believe that!

Reviews.Title: poor interface
Reviews.Author: A620N
Reviews.Content: Picked this TV up and returned it the same day.  I was really excited over the media connect option but didnt even get that far before putting it back in the box.  There is no keyboard on the remote and a delay in key input so entering my Pandora Email address took about 5 minutes.  I'm sure searching for movies on Netflix and music on Pandora would drive me crazy.  Everything else is probably fine with the TV but what point is an internet TV if the internet is horrible?

Reviews.Title: BAD BUY
Reviews.Author: Nazmul
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV 4 moths ago, already going through so many tecnical problems. DONOT buy this TV.DONOT buy this tv  donot buy this tv

Reviews.Title: crappy tv save your cash
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: Philips 55PFL5706/F7 55-inch 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV with Wireless Net TV, BlackThe Tv is not a good quality and it does not offer what it advertises ..... media connection will not connect and even with it wired to my laptop it would not show my desktop windows on the tv so this tv was by far the worst purchase I after ever made. This was a Christmas gift and was not open till Jan 8 2012 and where I brought doesn't even want it back... makes me rethink my buy habit... hummm drive to a store or buy through amazon.... Thanks to The Nerds for the sale a crappy tv Philips 55PFL5706/F7 55-inch 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV with Wireless Net TV, Black

Reviews.Title: I am so glad I finally decided to purchase this TV
Reviews.Author: Theresa
Reviews.Content: I must have looked everywhere I could think of over the past few months looking at 55" HD TVs.  I already own a 47" HD TV, but I wanted a bigger one in the living room, but I also needed to find the best deal I could.  When I came across the Toshiba 55" LED, LCD, HD, 3D, Wireless Internet connection Television at the price I found it for, I knew I had finally found what I was looking for, but I still had my doubts as to what the quality would actually be as I have never owned a Toshiba television before (I have owned several of their computers however), so I took a little time to think about it before I actually purchased it and I read the reviews, most were quite positive so I decided to give it a chance.  Boy am I ever glad I did, I thought my last HD had an excellant picture, in fact people use to comment on how good the picture was until I got this one, the picture is so clear and so detailed you feel as if you are actually there.  I think it is safe to say that I love this television.  The set-up was so easy, and connecting to the Internet was effortless I just told it to look for my home network and it found it, now I don't have to go through my game counsel to watch Netfix, and I love all the free widgets and Vudu and everything else you can get to online through this television.  It has to be one of the best purchases I have ever made.  The sound is good also, but I have my TV hooked up to my stereo system, it always makes the sound so much better when you hear it though an actual sound system. So, if your considering buying this TV I wouldn't waste any time, especially at the price they are selling it for!

ProductInfo.Features:
MediaConnect
LCD. Net TV
Energy Star. 120Hz
Net TV,120Hz,Energy Star
ProductInfo.Name: Philips 55PFL5706/F7 55-inch 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV with Wireless Net TV, Black (2011 Model)
